data.html:
See right through us

A guiding principle at Numeral is transparency. We have two fixed fees. And you pay only when you use our services. No monthly subscription fees. No variable pricing. No surge pricing. Youll never be surprised by how much your sales tax filings cost.

And Numeral lets you know how much sales tax you collected compared with how much you paid to the state. Avalara wont. They simply tell you how much you paid to the state, and youll never know if youre under-collecting sales tax.

Created by ecommerce sellers for ecommerce sellers

Numeral was created by folks just like you. Theyve created and built multi-million dollar ecommerce stores and know the importance of configuring your store correctly. Correct categorization is the launch pad for correct sales tax collection. And the team at Numeral helps you with that setup. AvaTax wont.

No long-term commitments

If you have commitment issues, Numeral is the place for you. No contracts lock you into pricing agreements you dont understand. Youll go month-to-month. Well provide you with our signature white-glove service, meaning youll only spend a few minutes each month dealing with sales tax. You can walk away anytime if were not making your life easier. Unlike Avalara, youll have to commit to a contract.

Virtual mailboxes for everyone

Paying sales tax in 50 states comes with A LOT of snail mail. Dozens of pieces of mail each month. And a lot of it isnt important. With Numeral, youll receive a virtual mailbox for all your sales tax correspondence.

Our folks will sift through it and notify you only when something important happens (like a change in filing frequency, an introduction of a new tax, or a change in your sales tax rate). Avalara doesnt offer this service. Youll end up with huge piles of mail on your desk that youll eventually throw away.

And Numeral lets you know how much sales tax you collected compared with how much you paid to the state. Avalara wont. They simply tell you how much you paid to the state, and youll never know if youre under-collecting sales tax.

data.html:
No long-term commitments

If you have commitment issues, Numeral is the place for you. No contracts lock you into pricing agreements you dont understand. Youll go month-to-month. Well provide you with our signature white-glove service, meaning youll only spend a few minutes each month dealing with sales tax. You can walk away anytime if were not making your life easier. Unlike Avalara, youll have to commit to a contract.

data.html:
Virtual mailboxes for everyone

Paying sales tax in 50 states comes with A LOT of snail mail. Dozens of pieces of mail each month. And a lot of it isnt important. With Numeral, youll receive a virtual mailbox for all your sales tax correspondence.

Our folks will sift through it and notify you only when something important happens (like a change in filing frequency, an introduction of a new tax, or a change in your sales tax rate). Avalara doesnt offer this service. Youll end up with huge piles of mail on your desk that youll eventually throw away.

data.html:
We manage their sales tax, so they can focus on growing their business.

We had many issues with TaxJar including late filings which incurred penalties, incorrect tax filing resulting in $5700 more paid in taxes, complexities around state onboarding, and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, rapid feature additions based on customer input, and so much more

Kevin Chanthasiriphan
Co-founder, immi

I was spending way too many hours every month... And if you wanted someone on customer support from my tax service, there was no one. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then on your behalf, registering, managing everything, is kind of taking the worry off of my plate.

Jesse Hiss
Co-founder, Fresh Sends

I found Avalara very confusing and I felt like it didnt do what it promised. With Numeral, I can trust that all filings are being done correctly in all the relevant jurisdictions. And thats all I wanted. This enables me to scale Explorer seamlessly without ever thinking about the hassles of managing sales tax.

Founder, Explorer

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 65%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  field-sizing: content;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:active {
  box-shadow: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit .actions {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit input {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill,
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:hover, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:focus, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:active {
  transition: background-color 5000s;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: var(--white) !important;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  display: none !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

	.v3_email-collect-form-embed {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
 .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  	border: none;
  	background: transparent;
	}
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
    flex-direction: column;
    grid-row-gap: 0.75rem;
    height: max-content;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field, .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
    width: 100%;
    height: 2.75rem;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
    max-width: 100%;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
    height: 2.75rem;
    width: 100%;
  }

}


</style>

<script>
  hbspt.forms.create({
    portalId: "39949294",
    formId: "7c6aefad-be41-466e-9cdb-38a4d3786439",
		onFormReady: function () {
      // Remove asterisk from placeholder:
      $('input[name="email"]').attr("placeholder", "Enter your work email");

			// April 1st changes:
			const pageSlug = document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('data-wf-item-slug');
      if(pageSlug == 'global') {
      	document.cookie = "enteringPage=global; path=/";
      }
    }
  });
</script>
